Class LessonsJsonParser

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LessonsJsonParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parse lessons config files
    Author:
    anthonyrey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<IListable> parseForSymbolLessons(java.lang.String path)
      Parse the file and create an arrayList of IListable (but to be precise, symbolLessonContainers are in the list but they implements IListable) (load hiragana and katakana) We need the SymbolContainer because Lessons have references on the symbols they use
      IListable parseForWordLessons(java.lang.String path)
      Parse the file and create an arrayList of IListable (but to be precise, WordLessonContainers are in the list but they implements IListable) We need the SymbolContainer because Lessons have references on the symbols they use (load Kanji)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parseForSymbolLessons

        public java.util.ArrayList<IListable> parseForSymbolLessons(java.lang.String path)
                                                     throws ParserException
        Parse the file and create an arrayList of IListable (but to be precise, symbolLessonContainers are in the list but they implements IListable) (load hiragana and katakana) We need the SymbolContainer because Lessons have references on the symbols they use
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the config file
        Returns:
        An array List of Ilistable (but really these are SymbolLessonContainers objects !)
        Throws:
        ParserException - if there is any error
        See Also:
        SymbolContainer, IListable, Lesson, SymbolLessonContainer

      • parseForWordLessons

        public IListable parseForWordLessons(java.lang.String path)
                              throws ParserException
        Parse the file and create an arrayList of IListable (but to be precise, WordLessonContainers are in the list but they implements IListable) We need the SymbolContainer because Lessons have references on the symbols they use (load Kanji)
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the config file
        Returns:
        An array List of Ilistable (but really these are WordLessonContainers objects !)
        Throws:
        ParserException - if there is any error
        See Also:
        SymbolContainer, IListable, Lesson, WordLessonContainer
